definition: air or sea voyage (seen as an individual, countable item)/flight/voyage/CL:個|个[ge4]
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time

sentences.english: Problems about last voyage usually happen under time charter party.
sentences.chinese: 最後航次問題是定期租船中一個常見的問題。

sentences.english: About 236000 sea-going and river-trade vessels arrived in Hong Kong during the year.
sentences.chinese: 年內，抵港的遠洋船和內河船約共236000航次。

sentences.english: The Southbound Voyage of the Loop Service begins at Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 環扣式航線的南下航次從上海開始。

sentences.english: You are kindly requested to cancel this voyage to Singapore, as the deficiencies are clear grounds of detention.
sentences.chinese: 建議取消新加坡航次，由於已經有導致扣船的缺陷。

sentences.english: We are waiting for the transshipment containers from the feeder barge being loaded to this voyage.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在等卸支線駁的中專集裝箱轉裝到本航次上。

sentences.english: All documents and drafts are to be despatched in two sets by consecutive airmails to us.
sentences.chinese: 所有單據和匯票應分兩套用連續航次航空寄給我行。

sentences.english: The aircraft they used for last flight was a jumbo jet.
sentences.chinese: 他們用巨無霸的噴射客機作爲上個航次飛行機種。

definition: leg of air or sea voyage
home port (of a ship or fleet)
regular passenger or cargo ship/regular steamship service
